title: See invisible
data:
{{version031}}
''This article is about the character trait. For the removed spell, see [[See Invisible (spell)]].''

'''See invisible''' (sInv) is a self-explanatory [[intrinsic]] which allows you to see [[invisible]] enemies. It can be acquired in the following ways:

*The [[Acute Vision]] mutation.
*Three ranks of the [[Antennae]] mutation.
*Wearing a [[ring of see invisible]].
*Wearing a [[hat]], [[helmet]], or [[artefact]] with the see invisible [[ego]].
*Worshipping [[Ashenzari]] and having at least *** piety.

Due to their mutations, [[Felid]]s, [[Naga]]s, [[Spriggan]]s, [[Vampire]]s, and [[Formicid]]s naturally see invisible.

To see the full list of monsters with See invisible, check the list available at [[:Category:See_invisible]]

==History==
*In [[0.28]], several monsters lost the ability to see invisible, coinciding with the removal of player-castable [[Invisibility]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], see invisible negated the penalties of fighting while [[invisible]] yourself.
*Prior to [[0.12]], this intrinsic could be granted by the level 4 [[Charms]] spell, [[See Invisible (spell)|See Invisible]]
